high_descs: Walk forward and right to the desk by the window
Pick up the credit card from the left side of the desk
Turn right and approach the right side of the same desk
Turn on the lamp on the right side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the credit card under light of the lamp

high_descs: Walk forward to window, take right
Go to desk, pick up credit card
Turn right , go forward, take left to dresser
Walk to dresser, turn on lamp
anns.task_desc: Use a light to read the credit card

high_descs: Go straight to the AC, turn right to the chair
Grab the credit card on the table
Turn right, walk to the cabinet with a lamp on it
anns.task_desc: Grab the credit card on the table, turn on the lamp
